      • removeDeviceFilter

        public void removeDeviceFilter(DiscoveryFilter filter)
        Description copied from interface: DiscoveryProvider
        Removes a device filter for a particular DeviceService. If the DiscoveryProvider has no other devices to be searching for, the DiscoveryProvider will be stopped and de-referenced.
        Specified by:
        removeDeviceFilter in interface DiscoveryProvider
        Parameters:
        filter - filter to be used for discovering a particular DeviceService

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface DiscoveryProvider
        Returns:
        true if the DiscoveryProvider has any services it is supposed to be searching for. If YES, then the DiscoveryProvider will be stopped and de-referenced by the DiscoveryManager.
